messages.message: Hi team, do you know why I have this error when I push to Github? Thanks!
Iâ€™ve been getting the same today, not sure why

https://github.com/instabase/instabase/runs/8077452538?check_suite_focus=true
```RuntimeError: Commit 716bef25 doesn't exist. Are you running `danger local/pr` against the correct repository? Also this usually happens when you rebase/reset and force-pushed.
bundler: failed to load command: danger (/home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/vendor/bundle/bin/danger)
  /home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/vendor/bundle/gems/danger-8.6.1/lib/danger/scm_source/git_repo.rb:118:in `raise_if_we_cannot_find_the_commit'
  /home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/vendor/bundle/gems/danger-8.6.1/lib/danger/scm_source/git_repo.rb:100:in `ensure_commitish_exists_on_branch!'
  /home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/vendor/bundle/gems/danger-8.6.1/lib/danger/request_sources/github/github.rb:112:in `setup_danger_branches'
  /home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/vendor/bundle/gems/danger-8.6.1/lib/danger/danger_core/environment_manager.rb:58:in `ensure_danger_branches_are_setup'
  /home/runner/work/instabase/instabase/vendor/bundle/gems/danger-8.6.1/lib/danger/danger_core/dangerfile.rb:273:in `setup_for_running'```

we are aware of this and looking into what changes on the github action side, seems there may be some behavior change in the github action checkout model that could potentially cause some trouble

but the danger check is non-blocking so please ignore it for now
cc @Kerr Yoo related to any patch professor related github action changes?

@kunal It's possible, but unlikely. I only added the new actions files related to patch professor. I don't think I made any changes apart from that. We did just update that permissions on forked repos, but that occurred after this error starting popping up
yeah we did change some of the github action permission which may unleashed this but we do need to change the clone depth here
previously we disabled it on forked repo
the clone depth is set to 10 now which means it could fail if you have more than 10 diverged commits in your branch, I consider that as a way to warn ppl about squash periodically to your WIP
